app_detail:
Your upperclassmen helped us prepare this excellent resource to help you transition successfully into the WesternU family! The app includes the Welcome Week Schedule, a comprehensive To Do List and Equipment List, details about Convocation and White Coat Ceremonies, What to Wear, Links to Bookmark, Recommended Academic Resources, and much more. Youâ€™ll take part in two scavenger hunts with over $1000 in raffle prizes at stake, and the key to winning is being able to recall facts from this app, so we recommend reviewing the contents in detail ğŸ˜Š
